subject: RE: [junit] JUnit 4.0 release candidate 2 Test.None
msgSnippet: Another way to say this is that we needed a Null Object to represent the case where there is no expected exception and you can t use null as a default value.

se where there is no expected exception and you can't use null as a default=
 value. Test.None is package scope, so it shouldn't be publicly accessible,=
 or am I missing something?
